      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void adjacentEnemyHandler()
      This is a method to fill in surrounding enemy in the ListView
      void AllOut()
      This method is used to roll dice automatically after the player chooses the attacker and defender It will stop when either the attacker has not enough army or the defender is conquered
      void clearDiceRolls()
      this method is necessary for clearing combobox for dice roll
      void goToFortificationPhase()
      This method sets the GamePhaseModel to fortification, which notifies the subscribed GameController to set new scene
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      This method is data binding for connection between controller and UI.
      void initializeDice()
      this method initializes the number of dice roll available
      void rollDice(int diceattack, int dicedefend, Country attackingCountry, Country defendingCountry)
      This method rolls dices of attacker and defender at attack phase.
      void rollDiceHandler()
      This is rolls the dice when click the roll dice button
      void territoryHandler()
      this method is responsible for populating adjacent territories
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This method is necessary for getting update from card exchange
      void updateView(Country attacker)
      This method updates the view

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,

        public void updateView(Country attacker)
        This method updates the view
        参数:
        attacker - current attacker

      • territoryHandler

        public void territoryHandler()
        this method is responsible for populating adjacent territories

      • clearDiceRolls

        public void clearDiceRolls()
        this method is necessary for clearing combobox for dice roll

      • adjacentEnemyHandler

        public void adjacentEnemyHandler()
        This is a method to fill in surrounding enemy in the ListView

        public void initializeDice()
        this method initializes the number of dice roll available

      • rollDiceHandler

        public void rollDiceHandler()
        This is rolls the dice when click the roll dice button

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice(int diceattack,
                     int dicedefend,
                     Country attackingCountry,
                     Country defendingCountry)
        This method rolls dices of attacker and defender at attack phase. The number of armies of both countries decreases according to the rolling results
        参数:
        diceattack - The number of dice attacker wants to roll
        dicedefend - The number of dice defender wants to roll
        attackingCountry - The country which invokes the attack
        defendingCountry - The country which is attacked

      • AllOut

        public void AllOut()
        This method is used to roll dice automatically after the player chooses the attacker and defender It will stop when either the attacker has not enough army or the defender is conquered

      • goToFortificationPhase

        public void goToFortificationPhase()
        This method sets the GamePhaseModel to fortification, which notifies the subscribed GameController to set new scene

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        This method is necessary for getting update from card exchange
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
